title: What are some reasons why asking yourself 'why' is important to live? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is so many reasons why you should feel important to live. Every person is on earth with a meaning. Everyone feels connected with something, like a flower, or the “dance” or the music or just connected with the stars (like me) And if you have a life with health and dear people around you people that loves you and supports you no matter what,you should always think that you are important on the earth because if wasn’t the (name or the personality that “we” have, the world wouldn’t be the same. (each person have a diferente idea of earth and everyone has something new coming.) is importante to live because the “world” wouldn’t be same without “you” or “me” in it.

It's important to live because you get one shot in this lifetime. It's important to live to find your own answers about why it's important. It's important to live to experience life's emotions. It's important to live to see the awe and wonders of nature. It's important to live because you wouldn't know it otherwise.
